title: Punished? Again? Why?...
body:
Hi, I was playing some games this morning and I by accident left 5 - 6 ranked game I'd say and now I tried to join and I get this banner thing saying that I'm in a low priority queue for games for leaving in champion select, those weren't my responsibility, I fell asleep on first time, second time was pulled out network cable, third time was because my pc restarted, coz I accident clicked restart to complete update and it took long to start again and fourth time was because I was at the shop to buy smokes and fifth time was for nature's call, I can't understand how I can be punished for this, I don't understand what I've done wrong. I hope this gets sorted out at once.

Thanks.

replies.body: Suffice to say, my advice to you is that unless you're willing and able to spend the duration of a game at your computer without leaving to do other things, you should probably stay away from matchmade games.
You have a particularly distorted view of the world if you think that this is acceptable behavior...

Falling asleep was 100% your fault for trying to play when you were that tired. Depending on how the network cable was unplugged, it could have been your fault. Restarting your computer was again 100% your fault. Starting a game, and leaving to buy smokes, your fault. Leaving a game to go to the bathroom, which you could have easily done before the game started is again your fault, if you were sick and had to keep going, you could have just not played. 

Also leaving 5-6 games in one morning is unacceptable, if every game only lasted 20 min due to your afking, + around 10 min for que/pick ban/load times you wasted a total of 27  hours of other peoples time. (9 players * 30 for total min per game 270. Divide by 60 for total hours 4.5. Multiply by 6 for total hours 27.)  This assumes 20 min surrenders... you could easily have wasted over 30 hours of peoples time if games went past 20 min.)
